I‚Äôm a social science student at Justus-Liebig-University Gie√üen and am currently writing my bachelor‚Äôs thesis about how ‚Äúacademic capitalism‚Äù affects language in sociological journals.  I‚Äôm especially interested in anything with a methodological approach that connects social sciences with math (for example applied statistics, analytical sociology) and the field of science studies.
